.. p l o t ..

In search of some adventure in their safe and peaceful valley, the
five dinosaur friends make a hideaway. From there, they spot two
thieves in action, stealing an egg from on of their broods. They chase
them down and manage to recover the egg without its parent noticing,
but in the process, accidentally create an opening into the valley,
allowing two dreaded Sharptooths in. Everyone must fight them off
together to preserve their peaceful way of life.
